desc: We donate 50% of our profits to charity. Adorned with 14k gold-plated and sterling silver jewelry of your choice. Mix and match to your heart's content. Charms also do double-duty as earrings. Triple layered, lined in 100% silk for that extra loving care. Buh-bye Mask-ne!

layout.text:
100% Silk-Lined Face Masks with Bling
Adorned with Love for Me + Everyone
We Donate 50% of Our Profits to charity
